document.full_text: actor wesley snipes, serving a three-year prison sentence for failing to file income tax returns, suffered a legal setback on monday when the u.s. supreme court refused to review his case.
document.title: actor wesley snipes loses tax case appeal
lines_and_colors: actor wesley snipes, serving a three-year prison sentence for failing to file income tax returns, suffered a legal setback on monday when the u.s. supreme court refused to review his case.
